entity.name: Dinner
entity.description: This entity tracks all conversations that mention dinner.

text: @sdr_medco Covid-19 is not limited to indoors.  I agree with you.  Order and have it delivered or pick it up and have a nice dinner at home.  Tell your husband that you are just thankful to spend time with him for your birthday.
